code:
flowchart TD
    Start([User Access App]) --> Choose{Choose Action}
    Choose -->|Login| Login[Enter Username/Password]
    Choose -->|Register| Register[Enter Registration Details]
    Choose -->|Forgot Password| Forgot[Forgot Password]
    
    Login --> ValidateLogin[Validate Credentials]
    ValidateLogin --> LoginValid{Valid?}
    LoginValid -->|Yes| MFA[Multi-Factor Authentication]
    LoginValid -->|No| LoginError[Show Login Error]
    LoginError --> Login
    
    MFA --> MFAValid{MFA Code Valid?}
    MFAValid -->|Yes| Success[Authentication Successful]
    MFAValid -->|No| MFAError[Show MFA Error]
    MFAError --> MFA
    
    Register --> CheckUser{User Exists?}
    CheckUser -->|Yes| RegError[Show Registration Error]
    CheckUser -->|No| CreateAccount[Create Account]
    CreateAccount --> RegSuccess[Registration Successful]
    RegError --> Register
    RegSuccess --> Choose
    
    Forgot --> EnterEmail[Enter Email]
    EnterEmail --> SendReset[Send Reset Link]
    SendReset --> ResetSuccess[Check Email for Link]
    ResetSuccess --> ResetPassword[Reset Password]
    ResetPassword --> Success
    
    Success --> Dashboard[Redirect to Dashboard]
    Dashboard --> End([End])
repo_description: CLI Tool Perfected Version Wrapped Inside A Docker Container.
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
